post.body: What, your birds DON'T like geeks? Geeks are people, too! :(
I lurved me some picture pages!
I love your new pic! And I'm often in that mood!
I'm jealous. But I get to deal with fun stuff, too. We're on our first loose tooth patrol - could come out soon
I've gotten a little addicted to facebook, but not for business reasons. Mostly because I've run into lots of old friends.
Oh, I had one first, too!
Share please! Feeling better, though?
I just saw your tweet from last night about 'the privilege' and, um, ROFL!!!!!
Just woke up and checked in here, and now it's in MY head!!!
I saw your blurb..and got an email :)
Well no, I've never been anywhere with your wife. But I have been to Costa Rica.
Hey, Froggie...we picked the same people :)
Did ya see Brian's pic on kiva? I had to giggle. http://zi.ma/97e6ce
I can see it now. In my 'housecoat' with about 9 cats. Oh, I'm so there.
You could do what I do, and still not vacuum the stairs :-)
I'd want a maid service, too. But I'd still have to clean up all the shit that's all over the floor so that the maid could clean
Ha! I hear ya there! I'm lucky I have enough thoughts to just make it through the day, let alone remember to write them down.
Therapy is good :)
I'm making the mashed for our Xmas day dinner. The only thing I have to bring. I'll make ya some xtra :)
Tuck this day in your memory, and in 20 yrs when people say "don't you miss when they were little?" you can say 'no.'
Diego being Dora's pimp. Now THERE'S a cartoon I'd like to see. Just wondering where the monkey fits in...hmmmmm..
Now THAT would have been a good idea! But no, I just got rid of things that weren't age appropriate anymore. I still spent cash
Yeah, the lack of tracking and the lack of info in sales reports are the big issues (IMHO). But they're making efforts.
I always liked CP better, too. But Zazzle is growing on me. Especially since my sales have gone up there, plus the bonus :)
Too cute! The first of many Christmas programs you will sit through. And they'll all be cute, I'm sure :)
3 year old holding me hostage on the couch. She needs lovin' cuz she's sick. Thank god I have a laptop.
Not looking forward to writing the schedule today. I think I need another daylight server. Anybody interested?
Good mornin' all! The mission: To get my to-do list done. Starting........NOW!
Homework time....I need coffee!
I'm FINALLY done adding the sweatshirts to CP (and tweaking and such). Now, back to getting all my stuff on Zazzle.
I love the Sunday Paper. Do I love it enough to go out in 21 degrees? I can't decide.
Getting ready for another kid birthday party today. Looking forward to 3 hours by myself, though.
Yup, goin' to the bus stop in my polar bear jammies this morning. I'm not proud.
Almost.....bedtime.....for....kids. Don't know if I'll make it.
Time to pick up the 5 yr old already? Time flies. Gotta get ready for her to unleash the bad she held in all day. It's like a tornado
Cantankerous 3 year old will be the death of me. So good yesterday. Can't get her out of her pj's today for preschool
Holy windy outside! I guess when it goes from 50 one day to a high in the 20's tomorrow, you'll have that.
3 year old did great at hair appt. It took 2-ish hours, which meant 2 Scooby Doo movies. I love my new punky hair!
Getting hair done today. Taking the 3 year old. Will be interesting to see how THAT goes!
Yes, I'm STILL dealing with dark hoodies on cp. Ugh.
I'm totally out of shape. Not that I was ever in shape. Shoveling show kicked my arse. Then I had a cigarette. Must re-think my habits.
Good morning! No 2 hour delay for Becca, but I DO have to go out and shovel snow. Ugh! Isn't that my hubby's job? He was @ work til 4 am.
Me, a 5 year old and a 3 year old in the dollar store. Complete mayhem. They wanted EVERYTHING!!!!!
You know all those people who say 'Never hire family?' All those people are right, whoever they are.
Ugh...goin' to bed. Worked. Too. Hard. Must. Close. Eyes.
Off to the bar today. Only instead of kids needing me there, it's employees. Same difference :)
Basking in the glow of the Steelers win, and in my comfies working on the couch. Aaaaaahhhhhh.
Quote from me today "Chloe! The kitchen towels are not for boogers!"
It's pancake Sunday in my house. Gotta get to work!
v v v v v v v v v v v v v v v v v v v v v v v v Just 'cuz I can :-P
There is no reasoning with a 3 year old. No matter how hard you try.
Things I never thought I'd say: You better quit playing on the steps or YOU'LL be the one with the broken leg.
RETWEET: 5HOURZFRIDAY Friday Catch up Sale Noon to 5pm PST only -$5 off shirts -$4 off mugs -$3 off stamps -$2 off everything
Holy crapola, do I have a lot to do today!!!! Good news: No shopping to do.
Furnaces keep pooping out at the bar. They were supposed to be fixed 2 weeks ago. I may have to kill somebody......anybody. Watch out :)
2 hour delay for the kids today. Really? How much warmer will it be at 10:00 as opposed to 8:00? 4 degrees at 8, 6 degrees at 10?
Darn it, Steelers. Well, at least I get a grown up night with the hubby tonight
Aaaarrrrgh. Titans TD. Fargin' fargidy farge
Yippee!!! TD!!!
Aaaannndd missed field goal
Frickin' fumbles
t minus 38 minutes until the Steeler game starts!
I hate to be a Grinch, but when it gets down to crunch time like this, I just want to get it over with. If there is a Jesus, he hates me.
I made it as a Zazzle Pro Seller. Wonder what they sent in the mail...I love surprises :)
I have cleaned out where we store the toys. It is beautiful and organized. Until Christmas. Then it will be a honkin' mess again.
